attributes.action: Make "Winging Chalk" at secondary school children exept from the laws on Assault
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Children need to learn to be quiet during lessons, and nothing does this better than a bit of hard chalk to the side of the head from a distance of a few metres. So long as the chalk is premium grade, and there is sufficient warning notices noticed in the school about the practice, we should be allowed to "wing away".

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
